definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
jurist/member of the pre-Han legalist school

sentences.english: Xie Zhaohua received a doctor degree in Law from University of Paris XI, France, in 1988.
sentences.chinese: 1988年在法国巴黎第十一大学获得法学博士学位。

sentences.english: There’s no doubt that law schools have overbuilt and that the legal profession has overpromised.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，法学院过多了，并对法定职业夸下海口。

sentences.english: Existent law theories are unable to solve many basic problems about adjective law.
sentences.chinese: 现有的法学理论并没有解决程序法的许多基本问题。

sentences.english: The most notable legal treatise in the century is Littleton's Tenures .
sentences.chinese: 该世纪最著名的法学著作是利特力顿的《土地使用》。

sentences.english: So when she goes to the law school she takes a serious risk.
sentences.chinese: 所以她来读法学院是相当冒险的。

sentences.english: Zhoubo, obtained his LLB degree from East China University of Politics and Law , is the senior partner of Shanghai Wintell Law Firm.
sentences.chinese: 华东政法大学法学学士，上海瀛泰律师事务所合伙人。

sentences.english: Higher level studies, however, may also have un¬avoidable methodologic flaws.
sentences.chinese: 但是较高水平的研究也有其不可避免的方法学的瑕疵。

sentences.english: She graduated from Wellesley College and Yale Law School.
sentences.chinese: 她毕业于韦尔斯利学院和耶鲁大学法学院。

sentences.english: Instead, he devoted his life to jurisprudence and moral philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 而是将毕生精力献给了法学和道德哲学。

sentences.english: The laboratory of law major belongs to that of liberal arts.
sentences.chinese: 法学专业实验室属于文科实验室。

sentences.english: Dr Matthew Stephenson, Assistant Professor, Harvard Law School.
sentences.chinese: 斯蒂芬森马修博士，助理教授，哈佛大学法学院。

sentences.english: We caught up with a variety of lawyers and legal academics on the deal.
sentences.chinese: 我们就此协议联系了许多律师和法学家。

sentences.english: This trend confirmed to commercial reality and the change of Civil Law philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 这种趋势符合商业现实，也与民法学理念的变化一致。

sentences.english: I enrolled in Yale Law School in the fall after the riots .
sentences.chinese: 暴乱之后的秋季我进入了耶鲁法学院学习。

sentences.english: JD carried out an elegant bathroom vanities and a large stock one.
sentences.chinese: 法学博士进行了时尚的单浴室面盆大盘点。
